misc: Bags Miura irons and is rumoured to sleep with them.
biography: Miso, a formidable presence on the greens, hails from the esteemed Hirsala Golf club. Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Miso has carved a notable niche for himself at the Hector Trophée.

With nine appearances in past Hector Trophée events, Miso's consistent presence underscores his dedication to this tournament. His crowning achievement to date is one Hector Trophée victory, a testament to his skill and competitive spirit. Although the Victor trophy has eluded him thus far, Miso's pursuit of excellence remains unwavering. The upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 will mark his tenth appearance.

Off the course, Miso is known for his peculiar habits and the extraordinary care he takes of his equipment. Whispers abound that Miso not only plays with Miura irons but also treasures them to an almost absurd degree – some even say he sleeps with them. This dedication to his tools reflects his broader commitment to the sport, making Miso a truly unique and compelling figure in the world of golf.
